title: BRIEF-Astronics Corp - Unit Selected By Multiple Asia-Pacific Airlines To Install Empower In Seat Power And Flight Deck Power Systems​
text:
Market News April 2, 2018 / 1:19 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Astronics Corp - Unit Selected By Multiple Asia-Pacific Airlines To Install Empower In Seat Power And Flight Deck Power Systems​ Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 2 (Reuters) - Astronics Corp: 
* UNIT SELECTED BY MULTIPLE ASIA-PACIFIC AIRLINES TO INSTALL EMPOWER IN SEAT POWER AND FLIGHT DECK POWER SYSTEMS​ Source text for Eikon:   (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
